name: UpdateVehicleDamageStatus
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
tips: For some useful functions for working with vehicle damage values, see here.
description: Sets the various visual damage statuses of a vehicle, such as popped tires, broken lights and damaged panels.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the damage of.

params_body.name: panels
params_body.description: A set of bits containing the panel damage status.

params_body.name: doors
params_body.description: A set of bits containing the door damage status.

params_body.name: lights
params_body.description: A set of bits containing the light damage status.

params_body.name: tires
params_body.description: A set of bits containing the tire damage status.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
